title: UDP Linux Server Client
description: A program created to allow communication between two Linux VMs

title: UVM Statistics and Data Science Club Website
description: A revamp for the UVM Statistics and Data Science Club's website. Built using a Django framework, Python, Bootstrap, SQLite3, and Shell.

title: Using RL to Maximize Social Media Engagement
description: A reinforcement learning agent that utilizes tweepy and a multi-armed bandits agent to maximize engagement on Twitter via likes, retweets, and follows.

title: Racial Disparities in Police Killings by US State
description: 2nd Place Winner for Advanced App Projects in the UVM CS Fair, An interactive map that shows the disparity between state demographics and police killings.

title: Leap Motion Element Game
description: An in-browser Leap Motion game that simulates the “bending” of the four elements (similar to the Avatar: The Last Airbender series).

title: Symmetric Cryptographer
description: A C++ program that can encrypt and decrypt a string using a public key-based algorithm.

title: Food Role Playing Game
description: A turn-based combat game made in C++.

title: Data Cleaning Lesson
description: A program used to teach others how to use python to clean data.

title: Schedule Compiler
description: Compiles user’s schedules to see what meeting time works best for everyone.
